text: ehet (ovungen) kavurun (tamange papayan venuven pasutævili vi eyin) æt vi pilisakara karagena, allahva - (ohuge niyogayan) sthira vasayen allagena tamange dharmaya allah venuven misra novu ekak bavata pat kara gannoda, ovun (satya) visvasavantayin samagama (snehavantava) sitinu æta. mevæni (satya) visvasavantayinta (paralovadi) allah imahat vu (honda) phalavipaka denneya
